column5: Well its been awhile since I've been bass fishing....well a long while so I was looking forward to seeing if I remembered how.  Well I got there Friday and drank some beer, then more beer...and never made it out at all so we got serious on Saturday. Went out in the morning got a bunch of little ones. Came back and got the Barbie ready for dinner..    This was absolutely delicious. Took hours to cook but well worth it. 4 Grown men just sat around it for 5 hours drinking and just watching it cook.....then it was time to eat....sorry, doggie.    On a side note, on the drive home I need to figure out how to build a small version of a  bbq pit like that. If anyone knows where to get the parts shoot me an IM!!  Oh yeah....the bass fishing was good, too!
You should get retired and do that EVERY day plus do a 4 hour run on the atv     Oh yah it looks good..  vance
that's my kind of weekend, looks like a blast,  outdoor cooking has to involve drinking, that's just the way things work
Right on right on, party at the moon tower! Nice pics.
I made a portable once. Worked great. I do believe,TJ still has it.10 years later.  Beer and meat and fish.  Priceless.
Yeah, we all hit rough patches in life sometimes---just gotta make the best of it!!!
Yeah, it was rough!!! Cant wait to do it again...labour day if all goes well!!!!
